title: Election 2016 exit polls : percentage of votes by gender
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Percentage of votes on the Y-axis for 2 different Sexs for 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Hillary Clinton had the highest Percentage of votes for Sex Female and Hillary Clinton had the lowest Percentage of votes for Sex Male.
There is a gap of 11.0 between the highest and lowest Percentage of votes found for Donald Trump in Sex Male and Female.
On average, the Sex Female had the highest Percentage of votes for all 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump. Whereas Male had the lowest average Percentage of votes.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Percentage of votes on the Y-axis for 2 different Sexs for 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Hillary Clinton had the highest Percentage of votes for Sex Female and Hillary Clinton had the lowest Percentage of votes for Sex Male.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Percentage of votes on the Y-axis for 2 different Sexs for 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Hillary Clinton had the highest Percentage of votes for Sex Female and Hillary Clinton had the lowest Percentage of votes for Sex Male.
There is a gap of 11.0 between the highest and lowest Percentage of votes found for Donald Trump in Sex Male and Female.
On average, the Sex Female had the highest Percentage of votes for all 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump. Whereas Male had the lowest average Percentage of votes.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Sexs on X-axis for 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Percentage of votes.
For Sex Female, Hillary Clinton had the highest Percentage of votes 54.0 among the 2 groups and in Male, Hillary Clinton had the lowest Percentage of votes 41.0.
For Sex Male, Donald Trump had the highest Percentage of votes among all 2 Sexs and it has the lowest Percentage of votes in Sex Female.
The maximum Percentage of votes for Donald Trump that was found in Sex Male was 1.26 times larger than the minimum Percentage of votes observed in Sex Female.
Among the groups, Hillary Clinton had the biggest difference in Percentage of votes. Where the maximum Percentage of votes was 1.32 times larger than the minimum Percentage of votes.
Averaging all 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump, the Sex Female is the maximum Percentage of votes and Male is the minimum Percentage of votes.
